data.title: Claudette Colvin's juvenile record has been expunged, 66 years after she was arrested for refusing to give her bus seat to a White person
data.description: A request by Claudette Colvin, a civil rights pioneer who refused in 1955 to give up her seat to a White person on an Alabama bus, to seal, destroy and expunge her juvenile court records has been granted.

data.title: 66% of employees want better office cleaning practices before returning to work
data.description: With the new omicron variant, employees want stricter cleaning policies at work. Here's what it would take to make workers more comfortable returning to offices

data.title: Rent the Runway's third-quarter loss widens as sales rise 66%
data.description: Rent the Runway booked a wider fiscal third-quarter loss compared with 2020, as its sales shot up 66% year over year.

data.title: Black Santas are appearing in US Disney parks this season for the first time
data.description: Without an official announcement or fanfare, US Disney parks are including a Black Santa Claus in Christmas celebrations this year for the first time in the company's 66-year theme park history.
